inn1.comm: beautiful line from Vinay, just outside off stump at a length. Left alone by Sibanda
even better from Vinay, this one swings away just outside off stump and again at a length. Little bit of shape in the air. Left alone
this time fuller and again shapes away. Sibanda leaves it well alone
pitches it just a bit shorter on and around off stump. Defended by the batsman
pitches outside off stump and shapes away to the keeper. Left alone by Sibanda
brings this one closer into the batsman. Little shape but Sibanda gets on top of it and defends it with ease.
pitches on a length outside off stump, shapes away appreciably. The Indian bowlers are certainly getting movement early on
brings this one in closer to the batsman, shapes away slightly as Raza plays it watchfully to the offside
this one wider of off stump, lovely outswinger. Let alone by Raza.
pitches just outside off and on a length, Ahmed is getting some sideways movement as Raza leaves it well alone
carbon copy of the last delivery, Raza defends to the offside
get a thick outside edge which goes to third man
pitches it slightly fuller on off stump, again getting it to shape away. Left alone by the batsman
this one is pitched up even more. Raza looks to get forward and drive through extra-cover but the ball shapes away just enough and he fails to get bat on ball
gets a thick outside edge which goes to third man
pitches it outside off stump, shaping away. Left alone.
Vinay brings this in closer to the batsman. Sibanda gets forward to defend
full from Vinay, pitches outside off stump. Stunted appeal from the bowler but this one hits him outside the line.
outside off stump and left alone by the batsman
first bouncer of the innings, Raza looking to get forward but transfer back late. Ends up swiping at the delivery to no avail.
squares him up with a beautiful outswinger pitched on a length and just outside off stump
this is too full on middle and leg, Raza gets forward to play an on drive through midwicket for the first boundary of the innings
pitches just short of a length on offstump, Raza gets forward and plays close to his body for a single
full and on middle and off. Sibanda blocks to the offside
fuller and just outside off stump. Raza gets forward to defend to the offside.
pitches on a length outside off. Raza leaves it alone
shorter ball on middle and leg. Raza plays an instinctive hook towards the legside for a single.
this one is pitched up and just outside off stump. Raza defends but almost ends up dragging on to his stumps.
Vinay pitches on a length outside off stump. Defended to the offside.
fuller and outside off. Raza defends with authority.
short of a length outside off stump. Shapes away and the batsman leaves it alone
this one slightly fuller, again outside off stump. Sibanda content to watch it through to the keeper.
good length wide of off stump. Once again Sibanda decides to leave it alone. Could have probably gone for a slash through the offside
lovely sideways movement from Shami. Once again left alone.
got this one slightly wrong as it angles down the legside, just short of a length. Sibanda tried to glance to the legside but ends up getting a legbye
pitches outside off. Batsman defends it to the offside
good bouncer from Vinay. Sibanda ducks under
great follow up from Vinay. He pitches this fuller and just outside off stump. Sibanda is tempted but ends up holding back as the ball passes the bat.
pitches wide of offstump and full. Sibanda reaches out and chips this through extra-cover for three runs. Its about time the Zimbabwe openers got going.
short of a length outside off stump. Raza glances to third man for a couple.
pitches full and outside off. Left alone by Sibanda
pitches on a length outside off stump, getting a little shape. Strikes Raza's pads and the Indian team go up in appeal, but this was hitting outside the line of offstump
just short of a length outside off stump. Played to the offside for a sharp single. Shikhar Dhawan pounces on it in the covers and throws for a direct hit but Sibanda was comfortably in.
pitches outside off stump and left alone. Raza looks to play but holds back as the ball passes through to the keeper.
outswinger on off stump and full. Overpitched and Sibanda rocks forward to play an elegant drive down the ground for four.
short of a length outside offstump. Once again left alone by Sibanda.
pitches on a length and this time going into the batsman. Sibanda gets forward and tries to play it through to the legside. Ends up finding the fielder.
Vinay pitches this on middle and just short of a length.
wide of off stump and short of a length. Left alone by Sibanda.
Vinay goes for what the commentators are calling a loopy bouncer. Sibanda saw this one coming and shuffles down the track but ends up aborting at the last second.
wide and outside off stump, short of a length. Sibanda works this to the offside for a single
slightly fuller, outside off stump. Defended back to the fielder on the offside.
this one on a length, angling towards the legside. Tries to clip it from his pads to no avail
pitches wide outside off stump. Raza plays it to the man at point for none.
Good start from the debutant. He angles this away from the batsman on off stump and is defended to the offside
this one wider off the off stump and angling away. Left alone by the batsman.
again wide off off stump and angling away. Sibanda dances down and drives this straight to mid off
better length and line from Unadkat! He pitches this fuller just outside off stump. Sibanda's bat is dangerously close but luckily evades the edge.
pitches this outside leg and ends up hitting the batsman's pads. The batsmen scamper for a leg bye.
fuller and outside off stump. Defended to the offside.
darted in on a good length and straight, Sibanda stays on  his crease and defends
Sibanda leans forward and closes the face to play on the leg side
Sibanda strides forward and defends back towards the bowler
Jadeja pitches on middle and leg, Sibanda leans forward and tries to glance but the ball hits the pad
he stays in his crease and defends with a straight bat
bowled fuller on off and middle, Sibanda drives slightly inside out towards long off
good length, pitching around middle and angling across the right-hander, Sibanda stays back, waits a touch, and dabs the ball towards third man
a short ball but the line is wonky, far down leg side
short of a length, pitching outside leg stump and angling into the hips, Raza tries to glance but does not make proper contact
defended from the crease on the leg side
short and wide outside off, a loose ball after ages, Sibanda gets under it and slashes the ball over point. Zimbabwe must make those balls count
Sibanda is hit high on the pad by one that pitches outside leg on a tight length, no room to work with that time
Sibanda tries to play the extravagant cover drive, reaching far away from his body at a full ball that slants away outside off. He made no contact
Raza strides forward and defends towards cover
shorter in length on middle and off, Raza goes back and defends towards the bowler
a fuller length on a wicket to wicket line, Raza stays back and blocks
he goes right back, covers his stumps, and dabs the ball on the off side
this time he moves his front foot across his stumps and sweeps the ball past leg slip to the vacant fine leg boundary
defended from the crease on the leg side
an appeal for lbw but that might have been slanting past off stump. It certainly pitched in line on a good length and Sibanda pressed forward to defend and was hit on the pad
Raza gets tucked up by a short ball and is hit on the hip, he responds well to Sibanda's call after the ball dropped close on the off side
defended from the crease on the pitch
Sibanda jumps up in his crease to defend a short of a length ball, that looked quite awkward
Sibanda makes his move too early, Unadkat sees him coming down the pitch and delivers a short ball, Sibanda sways his upper body out of the line
another short ball but this time Sibanda did not advance. He stayed put and the ball bounced high over his head
a slower ball beats Sibanda. Karthik fails to collect cleanly but the batsman can't capitalise on the error
Raza goes back quickly and cuts the ball firmly, doesn't beat backward point though
fuller and straighter, Raza defends back to the bowler
that's too full to cut, skids through outside off stump and beats the bat
Jadeja slowed it up a touch around off stump, Raza ended up prodding off the front foot too early and the edge flew wide off first slip to the third man boundary
played off the pads towards square leg
full ball on middle and leg, Sibanda turns the ball off his pads towards square leg
Unadkat's line and length - short and a little outside off - allows the batsman to sit back and steer the ball to third man
fuller length and wider line outside off stump, Raza moves back and across before letting the ball go
good length, pitching just outside off stump and holding its line, Raza pushes forward and shoulders arms
good length around middle and off, defended from the crease
a confident appeal for lbw from Unadkat after he gets the ball to straighten from a good length and hit Raza on the pad. That was too high. Zimbabwe reach 50 with that leg bye
nudged from the crease in front of square leg
Sibanda moves forward and plays a good length ball towards point
a wicket to wicket line from Jadeja and Sibanda defends on the front foot on the off side
played from the crease towards extra cover, Jadeja sprints and dives to field
shot! Sibanda is quite minimalistic in his movements as he presses forward and lofts the ball straight down the ground. He didn't complete that punch with much of a follow through at all
nudged on the leg side for a single
Raza plays the ball into the gap on the deep midwicket boundary and the running between the wickets is quite exceptional
his first ball is short on off stump, Raza goes back and cuts the ball in front of point
a flighted ball on off stump, Sibanda strides forward and defends
bowled slowly through the air on middle and leg, Sibanda tries to glance but misses and is hit on the pad
a flatter and shorter ball, Sibanda has time to go back and cut through point
short and wide outside off stump, Raza cuts hard off the back foot but places it to the fielder in the deep
Sibanda thrusts his pad out and kicks the ball away to slip
defended on the back foot on the off side
played back to the bowler from the crease

edged and dropped? Oh yes, Kohli's dropped a straightforward chance at first slip. Raza was caught on the crease as he prodded at a slower ball that turned away a bit and the ball took the outside edge towards Kohli's right, it was around knee height
played back to the bowler
defended on the off side

a loud appeal for lbw after a full ball strikes the pad, that may have been sliding down leg. The ball goes to Kohli at first slip off the pad and he throws at the stumps because the batsman may have been out of his crease, the throw misses though
driven through wide mid-on for a quick two
short ball on leg stump, chipped through square leg
tossed up outside off, cut off the back foot through point
defended on the front foot on the leg side
Sibanda moves forward, gets to the pitch of the  full ball and plays a graceful drive through extra cover
played from the crease to point
pitches on a length on off and middle. Worked away to the legside for none.
on a length and on off stump. Driven by Raza to long off.
slightly fuller on off and middle. Defended watchfully by Sibanda
wide and full outside off stump. Sibanda forward and drives to long off.
full and on off stump. Raza plays to the offside for a single
fuller and on off stump. Drives it down to long off for a single.
full and on midlde and leg. Sibanda gets forward to defend back to the bowler
pitches wide outside off stump at a length. Plays it to silly point
full and going down the legside. Sibanda defends to the legside for none
pitched on a length on middle and leg. Sibanda walks down but ends up defending back to the bowler

full and pitched just outside off stump, except this one turns in. Looks like its the googly from Mishra as Sibanda plays outside the line and the umpire raises the finger straight away. Solid knock from Raza who put in the hard yards.
pitches full of a length on middle and is defended back solidly by Williams.
pitches full on middle and leg. Raza digs it out but is unable to complete a run
pitches on a length on middle and Raza tries to work this through the offside
full and outside off stump. Defended to short extra-cover.
pitches short of a length angling down the pads. Raza tries to work it away to the legside to no avail.
on a length wide of off stump. Raza tries to cut away square but is unable to get bat on ball.
pitches on a length on middle and Williams plays a lovely reverse sweep past point for a boundary
pitches full on middle and off. Williams defends watchfully
on a length on middle and off, Williams defends with authority
this one is slightly fuller on the same line. Williams tries again to reverse sweep this past point but is unable to get any bat on it
pitches just short of a length on middle and off. Williams forward presses to defend
short of a length on leg. Williams tries to work it away to the leg side but finds the fielder at midwicket
Full and angling away from the off stump, Raza gets forward to drive the ball through the covers for a couple

pitches on middle, angling away from the batsman, and short of a length. Crashes into the pads but it looks like this was pitched outside, with height also coming into the question. Ambitious appeal from the Indians.
this one is wide of off stump. Raza has a flash at it but it ends up beating the bat and goes straight to the keeper
on off and middle, full of length. Raza gets forward to meet the ball.
pitches this on a length on middle and off. Raza looking to play through long on, but gets contact through midwicket for a couple.
on a length outside off and the batsman pushes at it, but no run
pitches on a length outside off stump. Raza backs away and cuts it square past point for a single
short of a length on middle and off. Williams tries to cross bat this through midwicket, but to no avail
Quicker one from Mishra on middle and off. Defended watchfully.
pitches short of a length outside legstump and turns in sharply. Williams able to work it away through midwicket
pitches on a length outside off stump. Defended to short mid wicket
pitches short of a length angling down the pads, batsman able to work it away to backward square leg
bowls this short of a length on middle and leg. Raza rocks back and pulls to backward square leg, but finds the fielder and is only able to get a single
fuller and on off and middle. Williams clips this to Dhawan at short midwicket
slightly short of length on off stump, angling in to the batsman. Defended watchfully.
on a length outside off stump. Williams gets forward to drive, but his shot is stopped by Virat Kohli at short mid off
on a length outside off stump. Defended to the offside for none
short and wide of off stump. Williams essays this through the square offside region for a single to sweeper cover.
short of a length, seems like a loosener. Williams waits for it before rocking back to pull with authority through midwicket for a boundary
fuller from Ahmed, going past the off stump. Williams defends to the offside. Wants the run but is sent back
pitches more in line with the stumps. Williams tries to play through cover and almost gets an inside edge.
on a length outside off stump, Williams intentionally edges this through third man for a single
bouncer from Ahmed, nice change up. Interestingly not called a wide as Raza ducks under it comfortably.
bouncer wide of off stump. Raza saw this early and steps into the shot and pulls front of square for a boundary
full and angling down the pads. Williams tries to clip it to the legside but ends up playing it to the offside. No run is taken
full and angling down the pads. Williams able to work it away to deep square leg for a single
full and just outside off stump. Raza able to squeeze this past point and almost makes it to the boundary but is reined in by Ahmed
short of a length, angling down the pads. Williams works it to the legside for a single. And the 100 is up for Zimbabwe in the 29th over. India will be pleased with this progress.
full and angling away from the batsman just outside off. Defended watchfully.
on a length wide of off stump. Cut away by Raza through the square offside region for a single
flighted and on middle, Raza gets across and clips it to mid-wicket
pitches full just outside off. Raza gets under it to heave it through extra cover.
rank delivery from Mishra, short and spinning away from the batsman. Williams manages to play a short-arm pull to midwicket
wide of off stump on a length but turns in sharply. Raza blocks it watchfully
pitches on middle. Raza defends once again
fuller length outside off stump. Raza defends to the offside
pitches on a length on middle and leg. Defended to the legside
better line as this is pitched full and Williams gets forward to sweep to backward square leg
pitches on a length outside off stump. Williams cuts to the offside for a single
wide and short outside off. Raza cuts but finds Unadkat at point
on a length on middle and off. Williams tries to cross-bat this through to backward square leg but mistimes the shot

Played all around this! Raina pitches this in a little closer to the batsman, but this one is not turning and Williams, who is playing for the turn, ends up playing outside the line as the ball scurries through the gap between pad and bat. Second wicket down for Zimbabwe.
pitches on a fuller length just outside off. Raza forward to defend
same length and again pitching outside off, but this one turns away sharply. Batsman was beaten by the turn

pitches on a length and Raza gets back to play through extra cover. Raza picks up the single to get a well-deserved half century. Zimbabwe will want Raza to hang around as they build towards the denouement of this innings
beautifully flighted delivery from Mishra. pitches on middle and Hamilton plays with hard hands, inducing an edge which falls just short of slip
pitches on a length on middle and off. Defended to the offside
full delivery going down the legside. Hamilton tries to sweep but unable to get bat on ball
pitches on a length, defended to short mid off
driven on the front foot to long off for a single
driven firmly towards cover but can't beat the infield
played back to the bowler
cut firmly off the back foot but straight to point
there's the release shot, Masakadza goes back and cuts hard, the ball flies off the thick outside edge between slip and backward point
driven to long off for a single
Masakadza gives Mishra the charge and then waits to see it his flat hit clears the fielder at mid-on, it just does and then races to the boundary
played off the back foot on the off side
Masakadza makes room and slogs, mis-hitting the ball over mid-on and it plugs in the outfield
that looked like it was coming. Masakadza cleared his front foot and slogged, trying to hit down the ground. It was the googly from Mishra and it hit middle stump
that's the googly once again, pushed on the front foot towards mid-on for a quick single
a much slower leg break, Raza had finished sweeping before the ball reached him, luckily for the batsman that one spun big and would have missed off stump
Taylor tries to work the ball towards square but misses and is hit on the thigh. The ball drops on the pitch and Raza urges Taylor to run a quick single
short and outside off stump, Raza jumps back and pulls the ball from outside off stump to the cow corner boundary. Far too short when you don't have the pace to hurry the batsman.
played behind point for a single
good length around off and middle, defended towards the bowler
lots of width outside off stump and the batsman simply reaches for it and steers to third man
played off the back foot towards point
the ball rises sharply from just short of a length, Taylor fends towards the leg side
what a shot that is. The ball was on the fuller side but Raza stayed in his crease, moved back a little even to get under the ball, and lofted it with a straight bat over the bowler's head for six
played behind point for a single towards third man
nudged off the pads in front of square for a single
short of a length with width outside off stump, Raza cuts hard off the back foot but can't beat point
this time he threads the cut behind point, too much width from Vinay once again and Zimbabwe have made a positive start to the Powerplay
that's a terrible shot, backed away outside leg to make room for a good length ball, and then he played an ugly slog, aiming to clear cover. That was close to off stump
dabbed towards point for a quick single
played with soft hands close on the leg side for another quick single
Taylor moves across his stumps so much that he's well outside off by the time he whips the length ball with his front foot in the air towards deep midwicket

Taylor moves across his stumps once again but this time he gets down low to try and scoop the ball over the keeper. He misses and the ball passes over the stumps. Karthik fails to collect and the ball deflects off him towards third man
defended on the off side
short of a length outside off, Raza stands in his crease and slaps the ball flat over the fielder at mid-off, not pretty at all, but effective

that's pretty, and it's cleared deep midwicket. Raza stayed balanced and waited for a fuller ball, getting under it and flicking cleanly. The boundary has been shortened on that side so it goes all the way
a short ball and Raza ducks under it
a low full toss, driven to mid-off
played from the crease with an open face towards point
short of a length just outside off, the batsman waits and guides the ball to third man
that's lucky for the batsman. Taylor tried to steer a good length ball that was too close to him towards third man. Cramped for room, he got a bottom edge past his stumps to the fine leg boundary
a length ball and Taylor swats it in front of the man at short fine leg
good length angling across the right-hander, Taylor gets an edge into the ground and to the keeper

Unadkat's picked up his first ODI wicket with a rather ordinary ball. It was short and didn't get high up at all. Taylor had plenty of time to pull it but it looked like he was caught in two minds. He didn't try and smash it for six, and he didn't try and roll his wrists and keep the ball along the ground either. He ended up giving Raina at deep square leg a very simple catch. A soft dismissal.
short of a length ball angling across the right-hander, left alone by the batsman
played from the crease towards point
tight line and length on off and middle, dabbed towards mid-off for a quick single
driven back to the bowler and the non-striker dives to make his ground
driven from the crease to cover
pushed from the crease through cover for a single
steps out of his crease and realises he isn't to the pith of the ball, so he dabs the ball towards square leg
driven to long off for a single
bowled him! Waller's played inside the line of a good length ball that held its line on off. He was trying to drive on the up and heard the ball clatter into off stump
good length and very straight, Chigumbura defends from his crease on the off side
beaten outside off stump! Chigumbura prods tentatively from his crease at a good length ball outside off, the ball skidded through and the batsman was late on it
nudged from the crease towards square leg
good length on off and middle, the batsman defends on the front foot towards the off side, the bowler does the fielding himself
the slower delivery outside off stump arrives so late that Raza is done with his wild swing by the time it reaches him
pushed off the front foot towards Jadeja's left
Jadeja skips to his right, collects and throws the ball back at the keeper after the batsman stepped out and played  it back down the pitch
defended from the crease towards the bowler
Jadeja appeals after the ball darts into the right-hander but the umpire indicates it was going down leg, that hit pad before bat
defended on the off side
Raza moves across his stumps to a full ball and tries to golf swing it to the cow corner boundary, he makes no contact
another loose swing against a length ball outside off stump, makes no contact, he's just lost his concentration here
this time he waits for the ball and steers it towards third man
short ball outside off, Chigumbura stands his ground and pulls, placing the ball into the gap on the deep midwicket boundary
a full ball outside off stump, Chigumbura tries to drive away from his body and is beaten
excellent placement! Chigumbura did not have much room to work with but he managed to stay balanced and loft the length ball on the up over extra cover

Raza had just lost his composure in the last 20 minutes and he's now been bowled by a short googly. He had moved forward a bit too early and so wasn't balanced as he tried to go back and pull across the line. The ball passed under his shot and hit middle stump
defended towards the bowler
chipped in the air but it falls short of the fielder running in from cover
played back to the bowler from deep in his crease
a full ball outside off and Chigumbura tees off, slogging across the line and heaving towards wide long-on
tossed up on middle and off, defended on the off side
nudged off the back foot through midwicket
good length around off, Mutombodzi stays in his crease and dabs towards point
with fine leg up in the circle, Chigumbura sways towards the off side to get inside the line of the short ball and hooks, he clears the in field and collects a boundary
that's a rubbish ball, short and wide outside off stump, Chigumbura simply chips it towards the third man boundary
full and straight, driven to long on for a single
in the blockhole this time, dug out towards midwicket
that's a long hop, Chigumbura goes back and pulls it into the gap on the deep midwicket boundary, he had so much time to hit that
the tossed up leg break outside off, Chigumbura drove it through point with the turn
Mutombodzi nudges the flat and fast ball off his pads on the leg side
that's the straight one and the batsman plays it with a straight bat towards the bowler
tossed up outside off stump, driven from the crease through cover

that's a terrific shot! Mutombodzi clears his front foot to create hitting space, he then gets down on one knee, gets under a flighted ball and lofts the leg break with the turn over the extra cover boundary
a low full toss and Chigumbura hits it through square leg for a single

caught at point! A short of a length ball with lots of width outside off. It's there to be cut and Mutombodzi goes hard at the ball. But he doesn't place it and hits it straight to Dhawan at point. A couple of feet on either side and that would have been four
Utseya pushes his first ball towards cover
Utseya moves on to the front foot and drives through cover
nudged off the front foot towards point for a quick single
Chigumbura has ruined Vijay's tight over, getting under a full ball on middle and leg and carting it over deep midwicket, that's on to the grass banks
well bowled, in the blockhole and Utseya squeezes it out past the bowler for a single
another full ball, nearly in the blockhole, the batsman forces it out towards cover point
another blockhole delivery, there's no getting under this, the batsman defends towards the bowler
a full toss outside off stump, Chigumbura drives towards wide long-off
a full toss on the pads this time, Utseya clips it along the ground to deep midwicket
Chigumbura plays the swipe across the line too early and is hit on the body by a good length ball
a slower ball outside off, pushed off the front foot towards point
in the blockhole outside off stump, defended on the off side
the slower ball angling across the right-hander, Utseya swipes across the line in hope and misses
driven on the front foot to long off
short of a length and Chigumbura smashes it! He simply stands his ground and hits the ball hard with a cross bat, beating the man at long-off on his left side
a full toss outside off stump, Chigumbura steers it behind square to retain strike for the final over
a full ball on the pads, Chigumbura misses it and the batsmen run a leg bye towards square leg
in the blockhole and Utseya can only push it tamely on the off side
Utseya swings across the line and hits the length ball towards cow corner, they could have pushed for the second but Chigumbura wanted strike
a low full toss and Chigumbura drives along the ground to Dhawan at cow corner, the fielding is swift and prevents the second
a full toss and Utseya slogs it towards long on, he mis-timed that
a slower ball to finish and the batsman hits it down the ground to long on, they don't even attempt a second and I can't understand that really

inn2.comm: hint of outswing there. Full ball on off stump and Rohit guides it to point off the front foot
Good line to the left hander. Outside off, on a length and Dhawan wants nothing to do with it
On the pads this time. It goes off the thigh pad to square leg
A little lift from the bowler. Back of a length and on the corridor outside off and Rohit shoulders arms
Around the off stump again, fuller this time. More practice for Rohit in the art of leaving the ball
On the stumps and Sharma moves to the front foot and hits it out to mid-on
Back of a length and it hits Dhawan on his stomach
More lift. Keeper collects it head high. Around the off stump on a fullish length and Dhawan lets it go
Good drive. Dhawan presents the straight face and Chatara makes a half-stop. The batsmen scamper for a single
Short ball. Dhawan looked hurried there. But he manages to swivel on his back leg and guide the ball over square leg
There's the first boundary. Poor ball from Jarvis. Well down the leg side and all Rohit had to do was ensure he got a tickle and away the ball went to the fine leg boundary
Back on the off stump line and its left alone again
Full and on the stumps. Rohit comes forward and bunts it down the ground
Oh, he wafts at it. The ball is outside off and swings away to miss Rohit's outside edge as he goes for an expansive drive
Good lines from Jarvis. Full and on the stumps and Rohit plays it with a dead bat
Outside off, fullish and invites Dhawan's drive which goes to the cover fielder
Short ball, directed at the body and he jumps back and fends it safely to the off side
On his pads and Dhawan swivel pulls it. Doesnt connect and it goes down to fine leg
Good lines from Chatara. He's targeting the stumps and Rohit can only defend it down the ground
Oh, thats a beauty. Lovely full length, Angled in at the stumps and the balls nips away off the seam beating Rohit's intended defence
And another. Angled in, seams away and this one has a little more bounce.  Rohit tries and fails to get bat on ball again. Just too good
Full and right on middle. Dhawan pushes it out to cover
Great shot from Dhwan. Full ball with ample width outside off and he throws the bat at it. The ball goes flying off to the cover boundary
Straight at the stumps and Dhawan pushes it down the ground
Back of a length, Dhwan looks to sneak a single but Sharma sends him back. The ball had gone off to point and the fielder had got a good bounce. good call from Rohit
Zimbabwe are not giving him any room. At the stumps and he dabs it back to the bowler
But it takes only one mistake. A little bit of room and Dhawan climbs into that one. Full and outside off and Dhwan's square drive races to the boundary
Good length on off stump. Rohit opens the face and guides it behind point.
bad ball there. Short and down the leg side. Dhawan goes back and pulls it to the fine leg boundary
Another crisp pull from Dhawan. Short ball on the stumps and he slams it straight to deep square leg
Zimbabwer are having trouble maintaining their lines with the left and right hander at the crease. well down the leg side
A little room outside off and its cut striaght  to point
full and on the stumps and Rohit defends it safely
Solid defence from Rohit again. Better line and length from Chatara as he attacks the stumps
Back of a length and outside off stump, with a little hint of swing away. Dhawan leaves this alone
back of a length around the off stump and Dhawan pushes it to the covers
He's gone. The short ball does the trick. A little more pace from Jarvis as he got the ball to climb on the batsman. Dhawan's pull sounded good, but it went straight down the throat of deep fine leg
Attacks the stumps again and Kohli defends it solidly off the front foot
Full and on his bads. No swing and he clips it off his feet with ease. The Indian captain gets off the mark
Back of a length, just outiside off. Kohli moves back and meets it right under his head with a straight bat
Angling down leg again and Rohit stays put on the crease and pushes it to mid-on
Down the leg side again. It clips the pad which causes a little excitement. The keeper dives to his left to make a good save
Lazy shot from Rohit. Shortish and outside off. He goes for the cut and misses. Rohit doesn't have his usual timing in this innings
Full and on the stumps. Rohit is on his back foot and picks it out to midwicket
Back of a length and it rises up to Rohit's chest. He is on the back foot and pushes it down to the leg side

Fuller and still angling down the leg side. Rohit moves foward and clips it off his pads. Midwicket fields it and darts the throw in to the bowler who breaks the stumps. The appeal is sent to the third umpire who finds Rohit safe
Back of a length and directed at the batsman. Kohli moves back and plays it underneath his eyes once more. Time for a Free HIt
Its full and Kohli's wrists come into play as he clips the ball off to deep midwicket
Sharp movement there. Back of a length, outside off but darts in to hit Kohli just above his thighs after pitching.
Full and outside off and its met with a lovely Shot. Kohli moves forward and essays a fluent drive through extra cover. Nobody moves
Full and on off stump. Kohli looks to play through the leg side again but only gets a leading edge which streaks off to point
Full length ball on the stumps and its safely dabbed to long-on
Back of a length and Kohli moves back and pushes it to the off side
Length ball, just outside off. He comes forward and pushes it to the off side with an angled bat
Good length ball. On the stumps and its defended straight down the ground to mid-on
Good length ball outisde off and he opens the face again and point cleans up
Good shot.  Back of a length outside off and he waits for this one and makes good contact as the ball beats the diving gully and goes down to deep third man
Full and at the stumps again. Kohli comes forward and defends it
Safe forward defensive to end the over
Full and on the pads and Rohit pushes it down to mid-on
he tries to make it up for the first ball and its far too wide outside off and called so
Back of a length, bowling from wide of the crease and Rohit pushes this out off to point.
Full ball, angled in and Rohit presents a solid, straight bat
He throws the kitchen sink at that. Lots of room offered and it was short to boot and Rohit flays it over the off side. Third man tries but cant cut off the ball trickling off to the boundary
Another rock solid forward defensive from Kohli
Shortish and wide outside off and Rohit cuts it down to third man
Full ball on the stumps and Kohli defends it safely
On a legnth outside off and it's left alone
Full and angling into Kohli. He moves forward and clips it off the pads to midwicket who misfields to allow the batsmen an easy single
Length ball gets the forward defensive from Rohit this time
Another four through the leg side. Chigumbura angles it at Kohli's pads and he flicks it away to the midwicket boundary.
Length ball, Outside off and its guided to third man
On the pads again and Rohit flicks this away behind square on the leg side
Shortish and outside off. Kohli goes back and cuts it off to deep point

Clipped off the pads again. Chigumbura's natural angle is helping the batsmen pick him off quite easily. Its a full toss too which Rohit clips easily off his pads into the leg side and scampers off for two
He's gone. That's one waft too many. This one straightens from Chigumbura and Rohit tries an another expansive drive but only manages a faint edge which is safely pouched behind the wicket
And he beats Kohli's outisde edge. Bowling from round the wicket the ball goes along with the arm and beats the batsman's forward defense
Nice and full on the off stump and he pushes it down to mid off for a single
Full and outside off and Rayudu leaves this one alone
Full ball and he leans into the drive nicely to place it just wide of mid off who moves to his left to collect the ball
Angled at the pads and Kohli swipes it off to the leg side
Short and outside off but Kohli's cut goes straight to point
Angled down leg again and Kohli clips it down to fine leg
Down the leg side again. Rayudu tries to get a little bat on it but misses
Down the leg side again. This one clips his pads and goes to the keeper
Back outside off, better length and it gets its respect. Left alone by Rayudu
Another good length ball outside off. Rayudu watches it into the keeper's hands again
Wider outside off this time and Rayudu's cut finds point
Full and on the stumps. He goes back and defends it
Good hands. Just a tiny bit of room, but Kohli makes his own as he moves to the leg side a little and cuts this ball off to the point boundary
Full ball on middle and Kohli dabs it straight down the ground
Blocked back to the bowler again
Punched to long-on for an easy single
Full and on the stumps. He goes back and defends it
good length around off stump, defended on the front foot on the off side
length ball outside off, Kohli stays back and cuts but can't beat point
an excellent drive, Kohli moves forward and across his stumps, taking the full ball from outside off and drilling it between the bowler and mid-on with a drive that used a lot of bottom hand
he moves across his stumps and nudges the ball off his pads towards square leg
a loose ball to the debutant, Rayudu goes back and cuts a short and wide ball to deep point
Kohli moves forward and outside off to get close to the ball before playing a punchy drive through cover point
punched off the front foot to cover
a fuller ball on middle stump, Kohli moves forward and drives through midwicket
defended on the front foot on the off side
there's width outside off and Rayudu stays back and cuts hard through backward point
now he opens up his stance to move his front foot out of the way and drives through extra cover
nudged with soft hands towards point for a quick single
too wide outside off first up, the batsman lets it go
tossed up closer to off, driven off the front foot through extra cover
Rayudu goes back and opens the face to square drive through point
driven off the front foot to long off
nudged off the pads to square leg
defended from the crease on the leg side
tossed up outside off, Rayudu stays in his crease and plays towards cover
tight line and length, defended from the crease on the off side
a touch on leg stump, nudged off the pads towards short fine leg
tossed up on middle, defended solidly off the front foot
driven on the front foot to long off
nudged from the crease on the leg side
tossed up on leg stump, Kohli tries to work the ball square but misses and is hit on the pad
tossed up, a low full toss, Rayudu clips it through wide mid-on
Kohli strides forward and drives, the bowler dives to his left and deflects the ball towards cover
a deft shot, Kohli waits in his crease, and watches the ball all the way on to the face of his bat as he opens it to steer to the third man boundary
driven to long off for a single
he's bowled that down leg side, too far away for Rayudu to connect with the glance
bowled full on off and middle, driven through covers from the crease
driven from the crease towards cover
short of a length on off stump, punched off the back foot towards cover
Rayudu was cramped for room as he went back to punch the off break through the off side, it turned into him from round the wicket
played into the off side off the back foot
punched off the back foot to long off
Kohli moves back and nudges the ball off his hips behind square
eases on to the front foot and drives a full ball to long off
nudged towards point for a quick single
shorter length on a straight line, played off the back foot towards long-on
full ball on off stump, driven along the ground to long off
Kohli makes room and drives the ball fluently through cover
played back to the bowler on the back foot
punched off the back foot to cover
driven firmly along the ground but to the bowler
tossed up outside off stump, Rayudu leans forward and drives to cover
moves forward again and nudges the ball towards square
pushed off the front foot in front of square and they run a quick single
played from the crease towards midwicket
steps forward this time and drives a full ball along the ground to long-on. This innings is on auto-pilot at the moment and the weather is fair.
driven to long on for another single
tick tock, another single after the batsman drives to long on
this time the drive is towards wide long-on for the single
driven off the front foot along the ground to deep cover
Kohli goes deep into his crease quickly to create the room to free his arms and pull to the deep midwicket boundary
he gets to his half-century by dabbing the ball towards point, he's hardly been tested in this innings
played off the back foot towards midwicket
there's width outside off stump and Kohli misses out on a boundary by cutting straight to point
driven off the front foot through midwicket
tossed up on leg stump, Rayudu opens up his stance and flicks in front of square leg
he goes back and nudges the ball off his pads to fine leg
driven off the front foot to long on
defended from the crease on the off side
banged in short but it doesn't get that high, Rayudu sways out of the way
short of a length on the hips, nudged down to fine leg
tight line and length on middle stump, Kohli moves across and closes the face to play to midwicket
stays in his crease and opens the face to run the ball to third man
short of a length around off, Rayudu stays back and steers towards third man
nudged off the pads down to fine leg
a quick single taken after the batsman goes back and nudges to square leg
driven off the back foot through midwicket for a single. Nothing is happening off the pitch.
strides forward to get to the pitch of the ball and whips it through midwicket with a flick of the wrists
defended on the leg side off the front foot
steps out of his crease and isn't to the pitch of the ball, but Rayudu manages to stay balanced and chips the ball over the bowler's head
good length and line but it's hardly threatening stuff, Kohli gets behind it and blocks
short of a length outside off stump, Kohli moves across and pulls through square leg
short ball and this time Rayudu swivels and pulls in front of square
a full ball on the pads, Kohli flicks and times it superbly, Waller sprints to his left on the midwicket boundary and dives, he manages to slap he ball in but then watches it roll on to the rope
square driven but it doesn't beat point
good length outside off, Rayudu shoulders arms, haven't seen one of those in a while
dabbed from the crease to short third man
punched off the back foot towards mid-on
cut off the back foot to deep point
cut off the back foot in front of point for another single
shorter length, Kohli goes back and pulls towards deep midwicket
tossed up on middle stump, driven on the front foot towards long off
length ball on middle, nudged off the pads behind square
good length on off stump, Rayudu stays in his crease and drives to mid-off
a wicket to wicket line, pushed off the back foot to long on
pushed off the back foot own the ground once again
good length on off and middle, defended from the crease
a full ball, on middle stump, driven to wide long-on
cut off the back foot through point
nudged towards point for a quick single
dabbed gently from the crease behind square for a single
played off the back foot towards mid-on, the bowler moves to his right and fields
driven from the crease to mid-off
bowled down leg side, nudged towards the fielder at short fine leg
driven to long on for a single
length ball on middle stump, played from the crease through square leg
played with an open face towards backward point
a full ball on middle stump, Kohli whips it with the angle into him through square leg
Rayudu leans forward and flicks a length delivery in front of the man on the square leg boundary
a length ball and Rayudu has lofted it on the up over the bowler's head, Masakadza tried to catch it but it was struck firmly and straight enough to beat the fielders on the straight boundary
and now Kohli goes straight, stepping out of his crease, making room, and driving the ball hard along the ground
moves forward and clips the ball towards wide long-on for two more
stays back to a fuller ball on leg and middle and dabs it behind point
nudged off the pads through square leg
played from the crease towards point
dabbed from the crease behind point
pushed off the front foot towards point
short and there's width outside off, Kohli stays in his crease and pounces, cutting the ball sharply through point
a half-volley outside off, Kohli leans forward and drives through extra cover
driven off the front foot to long-on
played off the back foot to short third man
Back of a length and Kohli dabs it off the back foot down in the direction of long-on for an easy single
Full and at the stumps, bowled from wider of the crease. Rayudu covers the line and defends it back to the bowler
Full and on leg stump and its easily flicked off his pads down to fine leg
Length ball, worked off to the midwicket region off the back foot
Angled into the stumps again and this is dabbed out through midwicket
More appetisers on leg stump and Kohli clips it to deep square leg off the back foot
Good length ball and Kohli watches it onto his bat and turns it to the fielder at midwicket
Slow, short leg cutter and Kohli pulls it strongly down to the fielder on the square leg boundary
Back on a full length now. Nearly a yorker but Rayudu safely digs it out
Powerful drive from Rayudu but all it does is uproot the middle stump at the bowler's end. Kohli could have been out there had the bowler got a hand to it
Off cutter, dug in short but its picked easily and carted off over midwicket to the fielder in the deep
Crisp. Half-volley outside off and he leans into this. Elegant front foot drive and the ball races away, all along the carpet to the cover boundary
Back of a length outside off and he stays back and guides it to point
on a length and it's clipped off the pads to deep square leg
Good length and just outside off. Kohli opens the face to push the ball to point
Full ball on the stumps and he drives it down to mid-off
Oh, well played. Dug in short, well outside off and Kohli deftly upper cuts it over the keeper's head for an easy four
Legnth ball, driven to long-on
Strong drive again from Kohli. Gets onto his front foot and strokes this through cover
Dabs it with soft hands to midwicket and both batsmen scamper off to complete the single. Good running
Short and wide and Kohli doesn't need secod invitation. Cut strongly to deep point
Oh, close. Full length ball on off stump. Kohli goes for an uppish drive but falls short of the diving fielder at cover
Good length and at the stumps. Kohli pushes it to long-on
Shortish and outside off stump. Rayudu hangs back and cuts it off to deep point to get to his first maiden ODi half-century
Good length ball, defended down the ground
A little room outside off and he goes back to guide it down to third man
Flicked off his pads but square leg fields it safely
Fullish and outside off. Kohli leans forward and pushes it out to point. The fielder dives and saves it but Kohli has already run through to get his 15th ODI century
Back of a length and he defends it off the back foot
Full ball, driven down the ground off the front foot. Bowler gets a hand to that to stop the single. Thats the end of the powerplays
Dances down the wicket, reaches it on the half-volley and flays it through cover. Powerful strike
Through midwicket this time. Down the track and uses his wrists very well to flick the ball off to the boundary
Pushes to cover off the front foot
Gets onto the front foot, keeps himself leg side of the ball and hits it through point off the front foot. Good timing on that
The Indians are getting a move on now. Kohli goes down the track and lifts the bowler straight over his head for the maximum
Stays back, waits for the turn and plays it down to deep midwicket
Yorker on leg stump. Kohli's jams his bat down just in time
He's holed out in the deep! It was tossed up and Kohli came down the wicket again and struck it quite well. But Vusi Sibanda at long on takes a safe catch
Full and on off stump. Defended
He's thrown it away. Caught at extra cover. Another flighted ball. Raina comes down the track, making a little room for himself, but he doesn't get enough elevation. A soft dismissal
Tossed up and he defends it with soft hands
Dabbed out to deep square leg off the back foot
Nice drift there. Karthik comes forward and presents a dead bat
Just a tad shorter and he moves back to defend it back to the bowler
Just a little down leg and Karthik is quick on the sweep. Powerful strike goes off to the fine leg boundary
Better line now. Around off and it is defended off the front foot
Another sweep, but this one is straight to the fielder
Pushed out to midwicket off the back foot
Fuller and its pushed back to the bowler
Moves back to cut it but can't beat the infield
nudged into the on side off the front foot
Flighted ball and its driven to the off side ring
Dabbed in front of midwicket with soft hands to allow the batsmen to get the single
Good, full ball on the off stump and its driven to long off for a single
Full ball around off stump and driven to long off again
Full and around the off stump, with a little turn. Karthik pushes it into the off side
Flighted delivery and Karthik drives this down to long off
And its all over. Four off a full toss. Tame way to finish a tame game. Rayudu comes forward and caresses this through the covers to score the winning runs on his ODI debut
